ques.prompt: Gay citizens face life prison sentences and their friends are now legally required to report them to the police, due to a strict new law signed on Monday where?

ques.prompt: Tupac was murdered in which U.S. city?
ques.blurb: If you believe in conspiracies, then you believe he's still alive. Otherwise, it was P. Diddy who killed Tupac.

ques.prompt: Which quote did Bill Cosby say?
ques.blurb: The dude eats free at Ben's Chili Bowl, guys. This is a big deal.
ques.a: "Winning isn’t everything, but wanting to win is."
ques.b: "Believe you can and you’re halfway there."
ques.c: "The past is a ghost, the future a dream. All we ever have is now."
ques.d: "The mind is everything. What you think you become."

ques.prompt: Who are the original members of N.W.A.?
ques.blurb: The guys do not like the police. You knew that, right?
ques.a: Ice T, Alec Baldwin, Tracy Morgan, Cube Ice
ques.b: Tommy Lee Jones, Will Smith, Jeff Goldblum, Taco John
ques.c: Arabian Prince, DJ Yella, Dr. Dre, Eazy-E, Ice Cube
ques.d: Dr. Dres, Will Smith, Ice T, Busta Rhymes
